welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Jose El Idolo
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Jose El Idolo, Guatemala! Get ready to experience the charming city known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all domestic and international flights at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for the handling of cargo and freight at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
